system.description: Used mostly as heavy hitters in @L[Category:Undead creatures]{undead} armies, these beasts are a menace and known for crushing through tough defenses.
system.appearance: Pale white, sometimes rotting, giant @L[Category:Humanoid creatures]{humanoids}. These beasts are made from pieced together giant and ogre bits. They usually have three arms instead of two making their strength even more terrifying.

overview.base: You gain @L[Ability:Offensive Martial Arts]{Offensive Martial Arts} and @L[Ability:Defensive Martial Arts]{Defensive Martial Arts}.

Your @L[Equipment:Hand]{hands} count as @L[Category:Weapons]{weapons} for the purposes of abilities that target or are delivered by (although they cannot be @L[Property:Shattered]{shattered} or @L[Property:Destroyed]{destroyed}). You may @L[Core:Attack Interaction]{attack} with them and their damage die is now [[/damage 1d4]].

Your @L[Equipment:Hand]{hands} count as @L[Category:Shields]{shields} for the purposes of abilities that target them (although they cannot be @L[Property:Shattered]{shattered} or @L[Property:Destroyed]{destroyed}). You may @L[Core:Block Interaction]{block} with them and their @L[Core:Block Value]{BV} is +1.
Note: This does not make your hands @L[Property:Blocking]{blocking}.

You count as being @L[Keyword:Undead]{undead} for the purposes of @L[Category:Abilities]{abilities}, @L[Category:Damage types]{damage}, and other @L[Category:Effects]{effects}. You also gain @L[Ability:Ethereal Senses]{Ethereal Senses},@L[Ability:Healing Sensitivity]{Healing Sensitivity},@L[Ability:Slow Mana Drain]{Slow Mana Drain},@L[Ability:Undead Mind]{Undead Mind},and @L[Ability:Undying Durability]{Undying Durability}.
You can see and hear spirits and @L[Condition:Ethereal]{Ethereal} creatures.

@L[Core:Healing]{Healing} can be used to @L[Core:Damage]{damage} you. If the creature providing you @L[Core:Healing]{healing} specifies that they are doing so "for damage" then you roll your largest @L[Core:HP]{hit die} and take that much @L[Damage:Holy]{holy damage} instead of the normal @L[Core:Healing]{healing} effect. This does not consume any of your @L[Core:HP]{hit dice}.
Deal enough @L[Drain:Mana]{mana drain} to @L[Condition:Dead]{kill} the target. If this successfully @L[Condition:Dead]{kills} the target, you @L[Core:Revitalizing]{revitalize}.

You are @L[Keyword:Immunity]{immune} to being @L[Condition:Frightened]{frightened} or @L[Condition:Charmed]{charmed}. The effects of Undead Mind are maintained even if @L[Condition:Transformed]{transformed}.

You are @L[Keyword:Immunity]{immune} to @L[Condition:Unconscious]{unconsciousness}, @L[Condition:Suffocating]{suffocating}, and being @L[Condition:Poisoned]{poisoned}. You do not @L[Condition:Down]{drop} due to being at negative @L[Core:HP]{HP}. You still @L[Condition:Dead]{die} when you reach half your maximum @L[Core:HP]{HP} below zero. You also do not have to @L[Core:Drowning]{breathe}.

You gain @L[Ability:Supernatural Strength]{Supernatural Strength}. In addition, you deal @L[Keyword:Boosted]{boosted} with all melee @L[Category:Weapons]{weapon} @L[Category:Attack abilities]{attacks} and they are @L[Keyword:AV0]{AV0} for you.

You gain @L[Ability:Giant Strength]{Giant Strength} and @L[Ability:Shattering Grip]{Shattering Grip}. In addition, you may @L[Keyword:Deboosted]{deboost} any melee @L[Category:Weapons]{weapon} @L[Category:Attack abilities]{attack} to make it @L[Keyword:AV0]{AV0}.

You gain @L[Ability:Improved Strength]{Improved Strength} and @L[Ability:Melee Damage Boost]{Melee Damage Boost}. In addition, you are no longer suffer the consequences of @L[Property:Cumbersome]{cumbersome} items.
You gain @L[Ability:Beastly Strength]{Beastly Strength} and @L[Ability:Improved Armor Piercing]{Improved Armor Piercing}.

Can wield @L[Property:Two-Handed]{two-handed} weapons in one hand.
Note: @L[Property:AP]{AP} weapons must still be wielded in two hands to be @L[Property:AV0]{AV0}.
Melee weapons you use are @L[Property:Armor Piercing]{armor piercing}.
You may spend an unused @L[Core:Active Maneuvers]{action} to @L[Keyword:Boosted]{boost} the triggering @L[Core:Damage]{damage}.
overview.proficient: You may spend an additional unused @L[Core:Active Maneuvers]{action} to @L[Keyword:Boosted]{boost} the triggering @L[Core:Damage]{damage} again.

system.trigger: You have hit a creature with a @L[Category:Damaging effects]{damaging} melee @L[Category:Weapon delivery abilities]{weapon} @L[Category:Attack abilities]{attack}.

overview.base: You have another body part (tail, tentacle, etc.) that can be used as an additional @L[Category:Equipment]{hand}. When used to make a @L[Category:Hand delivery abilities]{hand} @L[Category:Attack abilities]{attack}, this body part has the @L[Property:Wraparound Fighting Style]{wraparound fighting style}.
